main.py¶

tracker.py¶

utils.py¶

src.utils.define_h2o_dataframe(df: pandas.core.frame.DataFrame, label: str)[source]¶

This function transforms a pandas DataFrame into H2O DataFrame. It also defines the target column.

Parameters

  • df (pd.DataFrame) – dataset

  • label (str) – target

Returns

a H2O DataFrame

Return type

h2o.H2OFrame

src.utils.dump_json_object(path: str, object)[source]¶

This function allows you to dump an object to json format and store it

Parameters

  • path (str) – path to store

  • object – object to store

src.utils.dump_pickle(path: str, object)[source]¶

This function allows you to dump an object to pickle format and store it

Parameters

  • path (str) – path to store

  • object – object to store

src.utils.get_metadata()[source]¶

This function allows you to get the metadata

Returns

metadata

Return type

src.utils.get_model(model_type: str, version: str)[source]¶

This function allows you to get the model

Parameters

  • model_type (str) – model type

  • version (str) – version of the model

Returns

model

Return type

src.utils.load_json_object(path: str)[source]¶

This function allows you to load an object from json format

Parameters

path (str) – path

Returns

object

Return type

This function allows you to load an object from pickle format

Return type

src.utils.unzip_file(old_path: str, new_path: str)[source]¶

This function unzips a file.

Parameters

  • old_path (str) – old path (for zip)

  • new_path (str) – new path
